Lua XOR Encryption for Lua 5.3 (FiveM)

One of the most secure encryptors for FiveM

Simply select a file to encrypt, press encrypt and save it in your script. Remember to keep a copy of the source code!


I am not responsible if this breaks your script. I can't guarantee that this will work, nor can I guarantee that it can't be decrypted.


Known issues:
• String-obfuscation will not always work, resulting in needing to re-encrypt the script multiple times for it to work

Your file won't be uploaded to any server.

Heavily edited version of lua-simple-encrypt. Edited by Loaf Scripts#7785.
